metadata.title: RZ/A2M: Frequency setting for clock input from EXTAL pin

sections.content:
Question:
The user's manual describes 12/24 MHz as the input from EXTAL (Figure 6.6), but the register setting that specifies the frequency cannot be found. How can I set this up?
Answer:
Please refer to the following table.
EXTAL/XTAL UCLKSEL MD_CLK
12MHz±100ppm 0 0
24MHz±100ppm 0 1
10MHz to 12MHz 1 0
20MHz to 24MHz 1 1
＊UCLKSEL is the bit that selects the clock to be supplied to USBPHY.
For example, when selecting EXTAL as the clock for the USB2.0 host/function interface and inputting 24MHz±100ppm, the settings are as follows.
UCLKSEL=0
MD_CLK=1
Suitable Products
RZ/A2M
The user's manual describes 12/24 MHz as the input from EXTAL (Figure 6.6), but the register setting that specifies the frequency cannot be found. How can I set this up?
